title: Britney Spears was not 'back handed' by Spurs security, Las Vegas police report
description: The Las Vegas Metropolitan Police Department shared an update about its investigation into an incident involving Britney Spears.

title: DC Bar panel recommends Rudy Giuliani be disbarred over 2020 election efforts
description: The D.C. Board on Professional Responsibility has recommended that Rudy Giuliani be disbarred in the District of Columbia for his efforts to overturn the 2020 election.

title: Lyft driver shot dead in DC amid surge in violence in the city
description: Police in Washington, D.C., are searching for the suspects who shot and killed a Lyft driver.

title: UPS workers' union leader explains what's at stake as strike edges closer
description: Workers for UPS are edging closer to a strike after a breakdown in talks between the delivery giant and the Teamsters union representing its employees.

title: Biden slams short term health care plans as ‘a scam’
description: President Joe Biden slammed short term health care plans as “a scam” and touted jobs report as showing Bidenomics is working.

title: Unanswered questions remain after firefighters killed in blaze on docked cargo ship
description: Investigators are searching for answers after two firefighters were killed while battling a raging blaze aboard a cargo ship docked in Newark, New Jersey.

title: Shark-monitoring drones to hit New York beaches amid uptick of sightings
description: New shark-monitoring drones will be sent to New York beach communities amid an uptick in sightings, New York Gov. Kathy Hochul announced.

title: What are cluster munitions? Biden decides to send Ukraine controversial weapons
description: "These types of weapons are extremely dangerous," one researcher told ABC News.

title: Armed men storm Haiti medical facility, forcibly remove patient
description: ABC News visited the hospital recently, speaking to nurses and patients about the unprecedented levels of gang violence plaguing Haiti’s capital city.

title: Smith's special counsel probe cost over $5 million in opening months, says DOJ report
description: Special counsel Jack Smith spent over $5 million in his first five months probing Donald Trump’s handling of documents and efforts to overturn the election, the DOJ says.

title: Chicago probes sex misconduct allegation against officers involving migrant
description: Chicago’s police oversight agency says it's investigating sexual misconduct allegations against officers involving a migrant who was living in a police station after arriving in the city

title: El Paso Walmart mass shooter gets 90 life sentences in hate attack
description: Patrick Crusius, 24, pleaded guilty in February to dozens of federal hate crimes and firearms charges.

title: Ocasio-Cortez endorses Biden's reelection campaign, sending a strong signal of unity
description: Democratic Rep. Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez has endorsed President Joe Biden’s reelection campaign, a sign of the president’s strength in uniting his party to have the backing of one of its most liberal members

title: North Carolina amusement park adds additional inspections after roller coaster crack
description: A North Carolina amusement park came under investigation this week after a video surfaced online of parkgoers riding a roller coaster with a large crack in the support column

title: 8-year-old girl in 'life-threatening' condition after deadly London school car crash
description: London police say an 8-year-old girl is in life-threatening condition in a hospital following a car crash at an elementary school in Wimbledon that claimed the life of another girl of the same age

title: Middle fingers, complaints: Workers caught in culture wars face harassment
description: Workers at Target, Anheuser-Busch and Starbucks have been thrust into a political battle over corporate America, experts said.

title: US jobs report likely to show a solid gain, complicating drive to cool inflation
description: Another solid month of hiring in the United States is expected to be reported Friday, an outcome that would suggest no recession is in sight yet could make it harder for the Federal Reserve to succeed in its drive to cool the economy and curb high infl...

title: CBP rescues 2 people suffering from heat stress in southern Arizona
description: Two people suffering from heat stress had to be rescued via helicopter in a remote area of southern Arizona this week, officials said.

title: WATCH:  Thousands take part in first running of the bulls in Spain's San Fermin festival
description: Several runners took knocks and hard falls as thousands of thrill seekers took part in the first running of the bulls at Spain's San Fermín festival.

title: Man who served 13 years for murder is acquitted at a retrial in Germany
description: A man who spent 13 years in prison in Germany for the death of an elderly woman has been acquitted in a retrial by a court that determined that the supposed murder victim had died in an accident

title: WSJ reporter Evan Gershkovich has been detained for 100 days by Russian government
description: Friday marks journalist and U.S. citizen Evan Gershkovich's 100th day of detention by Russian government authorities.

title: How corporate America is slashing DEI workers amid backlash to diversity programs
description: DEI officers say they've faced cuts in the years since the murder of George Floyd.

title: Biden launches new push to limit health care costs
description: President Joe Biden plans to roll out a new set of initiatives Friday to reduce health care costs

title: A fire in a nursing home in Italy has killed 6 residents and injured some 80 others
description: A fire that broke out in a Milan nursing home during the night has killed six residents

title: Israeli forces kill 2 Palestinians in shootout in the occupied West Bank
description: Israeli forces killed two wanted Palestinians in a flashpoint West Bank city, days after Israel concluded a major two-day offensive meant to crack down on militants

title: More than 80 people injured in NYC bus collision: FDNY
description: More than 80 people have been injured following a bus collision in New York City on Thursday night, the FDNY said.

title: Relatives of El Paso Walmart shooting victims confront gunman
description: Nearly four years after 23 people were killed in a racist mass shooting at a Walmart in El Paso, Texas, the victims' families are confronting the gunman in court.

title: US set to send controversial cluster munitions to Ukraine to fight Russia: Officials
description: The U.S. is expected to announce as early as Friday that it will provide cluster munitions to Ukraine as part of a new military aid package, two officials tell ABC News

title: Philly leaders sue ghost gun manufacturers just days after mass shooting
description: Just days after a man wielding two alleged ghost guns shot seven people, five fatally, Philadelphia leaders sued two companies that make untraceable weapons.
